urls.title: ‚ÄòOrganised pollution‚Äô: Sewage dumped into England‚Äôs waters 400,000 times in 2020
urls.description: Rapid action is required to turn around the fate of England‚Äôs rivers, campaigners have said, after data released by the Environment Agency (EA) revealed that water companies pumped raw sewage into English waters more than 400,000 times last year.

urls.title: ‚ÄòOrganised pollution‚Äô: Sewage dumped into England‚Äôs waters 400,000 times in 2020
urls.description: Rapid action is required to turn around the fate of England‚Äôs rivers, campaigners have said, after data released by the Environment Agency (EA) revealed that water companies pumped raw sewage into English waters more than 400,000 times last year.

text:
RT @ChallisBecca: https://t.co/SUcZbfhfFC
Reported on this yesterday for @TheENDSReport. Was great to speak to @Feargal_Sharkey @jeremybigg‚Ä¶

Can‚Äôt quite believe it but the @EnvAgency is 25 today! I was there at the start joining as an Assistant Hydrologist. So much has changed (albeit not my taste in shirts) but probably most dramatically and positively the public‚Äôs awareness of the environment & climate.  #ea25years https://t.co/3bxEiEVxZV
